name: Sales Order By Salesman
query:
select
	so.name as "ID:Link/Sales Order:100",
	user.full_name as "Sales Man:Data:150",
	so.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:70",
	so.customer_name as "Customer Name:Data:150",
	so.transaction_date as "Date:Date:80",
	ifnull(so.rounded_total, 0) as "Total:Currency:100",
	ifnull(sum(gle.credit - gle.debit), 0) as "Payment:Currency:80",
 	ifnull(so.rounded_total, 0) - ifnull(sum(gle.credit - gle.debit), 0) as "Pending:Currency:80",
	so.status as "Status:Data:100",
	so.delivery_status "Delivery:Data:100",
	so.billing_status "Billing:Data:100",
	so.per_delivered "Delivered:Percent:100",
	so.per_billed "Billed Percent:Percent:100",
	so.owner as "Salesman:Link/User:150",
	so.company "Company:Link/Company:100"
from `tabSales Order` so
inner join `tabUser` user on user.name=so.owner
left join `tabGL Entry` gle on against_voucher!=voucher_no and (gle.against_voucher = so.name or gle.against_voucher in (
  select item.parent from `tabSales Invoice Item` item where item.sales_order=so.name and item.docstatus=1
))
where so.transaction_date between %(fdate)s and %(tdate)s
group by so.name
order by so.transaction_date desc;
